availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Watkins F. Nisbet (Hopkins County, Ky, merchant)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah F. Nisbet. Father of David A. Nesbit, Sarah A. Nisbet, and Samuel B. Nisbet. Merchant in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Thomas Watson as a clerk in Madisonville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 831.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 221A.
"Watkins F. Nisbet (1825-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #14537613, accessed September 30, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/14537613.
